welfare.translation[0].definitions[0].de: someone’s welfare is their health and happiness
welfare.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: Our only concern is the children’s welfare.
welfare.translation[0].definitions[1].de: help that is provided for people who have personal or social problems
welfare.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: The company’s welfare officer deals with employees’ personal problems.
the provision of education and welfare services
welfare.translation[0].definitions[2].de: money that is paid by the government in the US to people who are very poor or unemployed
welfare.translation[0].definitions[2].ex: Most of the people in this neighborhood are on welfare.
welfare.translation[1].definitions[0].de: help that is given by government to people with social or financial problems
welfare.translation[1].definitions[0].ex: a drastic reform of the welfare system
welfare.translation[1].definitions[1].de: money paid by the government to people who are poor, unemployed etc
welfare.translation[1].definitions[1].ex: Non-profit companies are providing job placement for welfare recipients.
